subject: Re: [junit] Anyone knows how to add a butten on the Junit?
msgSnippet: ... You ll need to change junit.swingui.TestRunner and probably junit.runner.BaseTestRunner, as well. It s quite simple code: I m not a good Swing programmer,
messageBody:
Bingwei Chen wrote:
> I want to change Junit 3.8.1 GUI. add one button on the Junit frame,
> such as only test a class one specific method. Any one knows that?

You'll need to change junit.swingui.TestRunner and probably
junit.runner.BaseTestRunner, as well. It's quite simple code: I'm not a
good Swing programmer, but I can understand it. :)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
